description: This file defines the InMemoryNotesRepository class, which provides in-memory storage and CRUD operations for Note objects in a notes application. It includes optional seed data and methods to list, get, add, update, delete, and clear notes.

classes.name: InMemoryNotesRepository
classes.description: A class that provides in-memory CRUD operations for Note objects, with optional seed data.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns all notes sorted by title (case-insensitive) and id for stable order.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its id, returning null if not found.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Creates and stores a new note with the provided title and body.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note; returns true if the note was successfully updated.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Removes a note by id; returns true if the note was successfully removed.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Removes all notes from the repository (used mainly for testing).
